title:
Drawing, "Profile of Catskill Mountains and A Cloud Study with a Sketch of a Walking 
Man.", July 1844
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed with date in graphite, at upper right: July 1844; and:  dark and mottled rock (grey),  main body,  distant.

Verso: Inscribed with date in graphite, at upper right:  Nov 1844 ; and at top:  2 warmish neutral tint showing thin places (yellowish thus) / 3 these narrow lines are of a splendid golden light / 4 cool cloud / 5 beautiful orange blue / 6 beautiful blue interspersed with light and dark clouds (thus) / 7 dark cool clouds / (not chilly) / 8 indescribable purple quite warm.
description:
Recto:  Steep wooded hillside.  
Verso:  Profile of Catskills and cloud study with a ketch of a walking man seen from the back, at right upper centre.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Profile of Catskill Mountains and A Cloud Study with a Sketch of a Walking 
Man.", July 1844.
July 1844. Graphite on white paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1386.
